name: Semantic Wave Operator Axiom
intent: Formalize ψ as the generator of semantic wave dynamics, superposition, interference, and resonance.
constraints: ψ: R \-\> R generates a one-parameter group U(t) \= exp(t ψ) with U(t+s) \= U(t)U(s), U(0) \= I.
Semantic norms or invariants are preserved: ||U(t)r||\_sem \= ||r||\_sem for appropriate inner product.
Under linear ψ, any linear combination of solutions remains a solution (superposition).
ψ interacts with Π in a way that allows collapse of semantic potentials into stable outcomes.
